channel.title: Faceposer and Black Mesa
channel.description:
Sorry, simple question, but I've created my channels in Faceposer and I cannot seem to find the .WAV files needed for, well... giving my 3d Model something to say.
They don't seem to be in the .wav finder, and filtering for vo/guard or guard or what have you doesn't seem to show up with anything.
Mind you, Black Mesa is loaded into it when I open.

item.title: Faceposer and Black Mesa

item.description:
Sorry, simple question, but I’ve created my channels in Faceposer and I cannot seem to find the .WAV files needed for, well… giving my 3d Model something to say.
